title: Replay binning pipeline
description:
Epic: replay binning pipeline.
Scope: bins_5m schema + batch job to compute deltas, capacity, reliability.
Deliverable: bins_5m table with deterministic 5-minute bins for replay.
Acceptance: bins_5m computed with deltas, capacity source, and reliability flags stored for replay queries.
Checklist: (1) bins_5m schema created, (2) binning job writes rows, (3) capacity_source/reliability_reason populated, (4) backfill completes without gaps.
Parallelization: schema (axi) must land first; capacity/reliability (4bnx) and binning job (2av) can proceed in parallel once schema exists; backfill (0e5w) depends on binning job.
Dependencies: completes when axi, 2av, 4bnx, q3a, nun, 0e5w are done.
Notes: keep bins idempotent by (station_id, ts) unique constraint.

title: Implement binning job runner
description:
Task: binning job runner.
Scope: batch job to compute bins.
Deliverable: job that populates bins_5m for a range.
Acceptance: batch job computes bins for a range and writes rows.
Parallelization: can run once schema exists; in parallel with reliability logic.
Notes: process in batches to avoid long transactions.

Parallelization: DB queries (hple) can be built while service wiring (ch64) is prepared; endpoints (fxtw, 48gy) depend on hple and can be implemented in parallel.
Dependencies: completes when hple, 0ny, fmz, ch64, fxtw, 48gy, nzl are done.
Notes: ensure time range validation and stable sort order.

Parallelization: base URL wiring (rn2v) can be done early; map render (15vz) can proceed in parallel; /state binding (p7w8), replay wiring (00ju), and optimize wiring (7tiv) depend on base URL.
Dependencies: completes when 15vz, rn2v, p7w8, 00ju, 7tiv, 4nv, s3k, 1b7, f24 are done.
Notes: keep map rendering responsive; prefetch replay windows.

title: Ingest persistence pipeline
description:
Epic: ingest persistence pipeline for GBFS snapshots and raw payloads.
Scope: poller -> parser -> Manhattan filter -> Postgres writes for stations, snapshots, raw payloads.
Deliverable: end-to-end ingest writes validated snapshots to Postgres on a 60s cadence.
Acceptance: station_information/status snapshots persist to Postgres with raw payloads stored and Manhattan filtering applied.
Checklist: (1) station upserts succeed, (2) snapshot header/status rows stored, (3) raw payload storage verified, (4) poller handler logs failures.
Parallelization: DB indices (s1n) can run in parallel with raw payload storage (4xx); station upserts (77e) and snapshot writes (bet) can be implemented in parallel but handler wiring (hca) depends on both.
Dependencies: completes when bet, 77e, 4xx, hca, s1n, 7dy, lhu, cpa are done.
Notes: prefer idempotent upserts keyed by station_id + snapshot_id; store feed_ts in snapshots.
